comment: /**  * Create an {@link AopProxy} for the given AOP configuration.  * @param config the AOP configuration in the form of an  * AdvisedSupport object  * @return the corresponding AOP proxy  * @throws AopConfigException if the configuration is invalid  */
code: /**  * Create an {@link AopProxy} for the given AOP configuration.  * @param config the AOP configuration in the form of an  * AdvisedSupport object  * @return the corresponding AOP proxy  * @throws AopConfigException if the configuration is invalid  */ AopProxy createAopProxy(AdvisedSupport config) throws AopConfigException.
